channel.title: Help with running server
channel.description: so i hvae a laptop and i want to run the server when i close the laptop or is there a better way of doing this like some servers have 24/7 how do they do it do they leave there computer on all the time?

item.title: Help with running server
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I am pretty sure you can’t run your server while your laptop is shut. I don’t think their is a possibility of even running it while it is closed. What I would do is go into your settings, and make it so it doesn’t go to sleep or hibernate, and then run it and leave it open. This way your server won’t shut off. Or just do it on another computer.

Read full topic
